bwwExcerpt: In a world that often feels more like a Sondheim second act than a sunny Rodgers and Hammerstein opening number, Schmigadoon! offers a heady dose of Golden Age escapism. Maybe too heady at times. As much as I enjoyed many of the songs, at the end of two and half hours, I found myself thinking wistfu...
wrongProductionNote: Show in previews (opens 2026-04-20) - review predates Broadway production
